name: YouTube fixes
description:
UI changes for YouTube like non-fixed header or padding in theatre mode.
Removing of title bar, status bezel, gradients and list of recommended videos in video player.

Note: See "Customize Settings" for options.
additional_info:
2017-11-21 Added settings 'Show country code' and 'Crop avatar pictures'.
2019-03-07 Added setting 'Video player - show 'Scroll for details' button'
